name: Savings for the Most Experienced
short_description: Over 60 but still living on the edge? Stay at Oceans Edge and save up to 15%!
short_description_detail_page: Those over 60 enjoy great rates at Oceans Edge. Book directly with us and save up to 15%!
description:
BOOK THIS OFFER AND ENJOY :

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, and bicycle rental
  • Shuttle ser,vice to Key West Historic Seaport (Downtown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions: Valid picture ID required at time arrival. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. Onsite parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.

image.name: Sunset Cruise
image.alt: Special offers for those over 60 at Oceans Edge Resort and Marina
